DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess bioequivalence Ibuprofen 200 mg + Pseudoephedrine HCL 30 mg fasting condition .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalency Study Ibuprofen 200 mg Pseudoephedrine HCL 30 mg Tablets Dr. Reddy 's Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: This study assess bioequivalence Ibuprofen 200 mg + Pseudoephedrine HCL 30 mg Tablets Dr. Reddy 's AdvilÂ® Cold Sinus Caplets Wyeth Consumer Healthcare healthy human adult subject single oral administration fast condition washout period 7 day .
